Text: Calochilus, commonly known as beard orchids, is a genus of about 30 species of plants in the orchid family, Orchidaceae.

Triplets:<Calochilus
2:
--------------------
Text: Calochilus:  Their most striking feature is a densely hairy labellum, giving rise to their common name.
Triplets:<Calochilus
4:
--------------------
Text: Calochilus:  Most species occur in Australia but some are found in New Zealand, New Guinea and New Caledonia.
